name: Activate Operation
description: This operation activates the created Task for the prescription. The httpo-RequestBody of the operation must contain the qes signed Bundle of the prescription. The prescription server updates the task ressource and creates a signature. The insurent gets access to this dataset.

parameter.name: KBVBundle
parameter.documentation: The Task needs the signed KBV Bundle as a input to be activated.

parameter.name: signed Task
parameter.documentation: The activated Task gets an signature and should be displayed.
